comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. on start 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? output is correct What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? v.3.0.9 - 3.0.10 Please provide any additional information below. can't move map by finger starting from v.3.0.9

Please see: https://code.google.com/p/osmdroid/issues/detail?id=415

You likely have clickable:true on the MapView. Remove it and it will work.
